panels.description: Total WAF requests by country in the selected time range.
panels.title: WAF Requests by Country (Time Range)

targets.expr: (sum by (company_name, action) (ddos_action_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"}) / ignoring(action) group_left() sum by(company_name) (ddos_requests_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})) * ignoring(action) group_left() sum by(company_name) (ddos_requests_rate_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})

(sum by (company_name, action) (bot_requests_by_action_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"}) / ignoring(action) group_left() sum by(company_name) (bot_requests_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})) * ignoring(action) group_left() sum by(company_name) (bot_requests_rate_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})

(sum by (company_name, reason) (bot_requests_by_reason_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"}) / ignoring(reason) group_left() sum by(company_name) (bot_requests_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})) * ignoring(reason) group_left() sum by(company_name) (bot_requests_rate_total{company_name=~"$company",vhost=~"$vhost"})

panels.description: Total Bot Mitigation requests by country in the selected time range.
panels.title: Bot Mitigation Requests by Country (Time Range)
